metadata.title: CVE-2008-4392 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: dnscache in Daniel J. Bernstein djbdns 1.05 does not prevent simultaneousidentical outbound DNS queries, which makes it easier for remote attackersto spoof DNS responses, as demonstrated by a spoofed A record in theAdditional section of a response to a Start of Authority (SOA) query.

criterions.comment: djbdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
